text: 44:22 Jeremaia 25:11; 25:18; 25:38Ia arazir bar kuribagh ami, ezɨ gɨn Ikiavɨra Itir God ian arazir kurar kam bar a giporpore. Bizir kam bangɨn, a ian nguazim gamizɨ, a ikuvigha nguazir kɨnimɨn oto. Ezɨ gumazitam an itir puvatɨgha iza datɨrɨghɨn tu. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, Kantrin Igharazibar Gumazamiziba akar kurabar uan apanibav kɨmasa kamaghɨn mɨgei, ‘Ia Juda ikuvizɨ moghɨn, ia ikuvigham.’
